Def: Thank you for waiting for few moment
EN: Thank you for waiting a moment

Def:
Do you want to cancel
the current order?
EN:
Do you want to cancel
the current order?

Def: KVS ID not found! Please contact the hotline.
EN: KVS ID not found! Please contact the hotline.
AR: تعريف KVS غير موجود! يرجى الاتصال بالخط الساخن.
ZH: 找不到 KVS ID！请联系热线。

EN:
Sorry
There appears to be a problem with your order
Please could you re-order and pay at a manned till
Thank you
AR:
عذرًا
يبدو أن هناك مشكلة في طلبك
يرجى إعادة الطلب والدفع في خزينة بها أحد الموظفين
شكرًا لك
ZH:
抱歉
您的订单似乎有问题
请重新订购并在有人的收银台付款
谢谢

Def: The maximum number of promotional items was exceeded
EN: The maximum number of promotional items was exceeded
AR: تم تجاوز الحد الأقصى لعدد أصناف عروض الخصم
ZH: 超过了促销商品的最大数量

Def: The maximum number of promotional items was exceeded

EN: The selected promotion is not cumulative with other promotions

ZH: 所选促销商品不能与其他促销商品累计

Def: Valid only for take in orders!
EN: Valid only for Eat in orders!

Def: Promotion valid only for take away orders!

ZH: 此优惠仅适用于带走订单！

AR: عائدات اختبار وحدة البيع: عملية ناجحة

EN: Are you sure you want to cancel the order?

CHOOSE YOUR AREA,
WE DELIVER YOUR ORDER !
EN:
CHOOSE YOUR AREA,
WE DELIVER YOUR ORDER !

اختر منطقتك

EN: Touch the screen to continue your order

EN:
Payment not integrated on POS

Def: Please follow the instructions on the terminal display
EN: Please follow the instructions on the terminal display

Def: Please follow your order to the register.
EN: Please follow your order to the register.

Def:
Please proceed to the counter
to complete your transaction.
EN:
Please proceed to the counter
to complete your transaction.
AR:
يرجى الذهاب إلى الكونتر
لإتمام معاملتك.
ZH:
请到柜台
完成您的交易。

Def:
PAYMENT FAILURE
There has been an issue processing your card.
No payment has been taken.
Please proceed to a manned counter to place your order.
EN:
PAYMENT FAILURE
There has been an issue processing your card.
No payment has been taken.
Please proceed to a manned counter to place your order.
AR:
فشل في الدفع
حدثت مشكلة أثناء معالجة بطاقتك.
لم يتم دفع أي مبلغ.
يرجى التوجه إلى كونتر به أحد الموظفين لتقديم طلبك.
ZH:
付款失败
处理您的卡片时出现问题。
尚未付款。
请到有人的柜台下单。

AR: خطأ في الطابعة - لا يوجد ورق.

EN: Any discounts or vouchers must be processed at a manned till

Please be aware that payment hasn't been taken

Def: How would you like to be served?
EN: How would you like to be served?
AR: كيف تريد أن يتم تقديم الطعام لك؟

ZH: 请在下面输入您的号码

Def:
Please take the tent from the dispenser on the side of the kiosk

Take a seat within the resturant and display your tent clearly

We will serve your food at the table

Thank you for visiting Slim Chickens
EN:
Please take the tent from the dispenser on the side of the kiosk

Take a seat within the resturant and display your tent clearly

We will serve your food at the table

Thank you for visiting Slim Chickens
AR:
يرجى أخذ بطاقة الطاولة من الجهاز الموجود على جانب الكشك

اجلس داخل المطعم واعرض بطاقة الطاولة بوضوح

سوف نقدم طعامك على الطاولة

شكرا لك لزيارة Slim Chickens
ZH:
请从kiosk旁的自动售货机上拿走餐牌

在餐厅就坐，清楚展示您的餐牌

我们会送上您的食物

感谢您光临Slim Chickens

EN:
Please take your receipt and head to the collection point

ZH:
请拿好收据，前往集分点

感谢您光临Slim Chickens

Def: Pick up a tent from the side of the kiosk and enter the number below
EN: Pick up a tent from the side of the kiosk and enter the number below
